text: Simon Schenk (16 May 1946 â€“ 1 May 2020) was a Swiss politician. He was born in Langnau im Emmental, Switzerland. He was a member of the Swiss People's Party. Schenk was a member of the National Council from 1994 to 2001. He represented the Canton of Bern. He was also the coach of the Switzerland men's national ice hockey team. Schenk died on 1 May 2020 of a stroke caused by heart surgery in Bern, aged 73. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Swiss politicians Category:Swiss ice hockey players Category:Sportspeople from the canton of Bern Category:Emmental (administrative district)
title: Simon Schenk
